snippet.title: SUPERHOT VR - PSVR Accolades Trailer | E3 2017
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/superhot-vr-ps4/

"SUPERHOT VR feels downright rapturous." - Polygon
"This is a redemptive VR game" - Rock Paper Shotgun
"Feel like a beautiful ballerina of death" - GameSpot

Lose track of what’s real. Commit yourself, body and mind. Confront the evocative, elegantly brutal world of SUPERHOT VR. Enemies pouring into the room from all sides, a dozen bullets coursing through the air.... wait.

Something is different here....

SUPERHOT VR is a title reimagined and redesigned from the ground up for VR and hand controllers. The fruit of over three years of close cooperation between the critically acclaimed SUPERHOT Team, SUPERHOT VR brings the intensely visceral action of SUPERHOT directly into your head and soul.

🏆 DICE Immersive Reality Game of the Year 2017 Winner
🏆 GDCA VR/AR Game of the Year 2017 Nominee
🏆 New York Game Awards Game of the Year 2017 Winner
🏆 Game Connection Best Hardcore Game 2017 Winner
🏆 Digital Dragons 2017 VR Game of the Year 2017 Winner
🏆 SXSW Trending Game of the Year 2017 Nominee
🏆 Unity Vision Summit VR Game of the Year 2017 Winner
